templatestyles-desc: Implementa folios de stilo per patrono
templatestyles-missing-src: Le attributo src de TemplateStyles non debe esser vacue.
templatestyles-invalid-src: Titulo non valide pro le attributo src de TemplateStyles.
templatestyles-invalid-wrapper: Valor non valide pro le attributo wrapper de TemplateStyles.
templatestyles-bad-src: Le pagina [[:$1|$2]] debe haber un modello de contento "{{int:content-model-sanitized-css}}" pro TemplateStyles (le modello actual es "$3").
templatestyles-errorcomment:
Errores processante le folio de stilo [[:$1]] (version $2):
$3
templatestyles-size-exceeded: Le filio de stilo es plus grande que le dimension maximal de $2.
templatestyles-end-tag-injection: Le folio de stilo fornite contine </style, lo que non es permittite.
templatestyles-stylesheet-error-category: Folios de stilo TemplateStyles con errores
Le folio de stilo TemplateStyles ha un error.
templatestyles-page-error-category-desc: On error ha occurrite processante un etiquetta sur le pagina.
templatestyles-error-at-rule-block-not-a: Bloco non permittite pro @$3 in linea $1 character $2.
templatestyles-error-at-rule-block-requi: Bloco obligatori pro @$3 in linea $1 character $2.
templatestyles-error-bad-character-in-ur: Character non valide in URL in linea $1 character $2.
templatestyles-error-bad-escape: Character non valide in escappamento in linea $1 character $2.
templatestyles-error-bad-value-for-prope: Valor non valide o non supportate pro le proprietate $3 in linea $1 character $2.
templatestyles-error-expected-colon: Expectava un duo-punctos in linea $1 character $2.
templatestyles-error-expected-declaratio: Expectava un declaration in linea $1 character $2.
Expectava un lista de declarationes in linea $1 character $2.
templatestyles-error-expected-eof: Expectava le fin del filio de stilo in linea $1 character $2.
templatestyles-error-expected-ident: Expectava un identificator in linea $1 character $2.
templatestyles-error-expected-page-margi: Expectava un regula-@ de margine @page in linea $1, character $2.
templatestyles-error-expected-qualified-: Expectava un regula de stilo in linea $1 character $2.
templatestyles-error-expected-stylesheet: Expectava un folio de stilo in linea $1 character $2.
templatestyles-error-invalid-font-face-a: @font-face permitte nihil ante le bloco in linea $1 character $2.
templatestyles-error-invalid-font-featur: @$3 permitte nihil ante le bloco in linea $1 character $2.
Valor non valide del proprietate "font feature value" in linea $1 character $2.
Lista de typos de litteras non valide pro @font-feature-values in linea $1 character $2.
templatestyles-error-invalid-import-valu: Valor non valide de @import in linea $1 character $2.
